snippet: The Miami Heat opted to rest LeBron James and Chris Bosh, and the host Washington Wizards capitalized with a 114-93 victory Monday that clinched the No. 1 seed for the Indiana Pacers.
abstract: Washington Wizards beat Miami Heat, 114-93, after Heat opts to rest stars LeBron James and Chris Bosh, allowing Indiana Pacers to clinch top seed in NBA Eastern Conference; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Miami Heat opted to rest LeBron James and Chris Bosh, and the host Washington Wizards capitalized with a 114-93 victory Monday that clinched the No. 1 seed for the Indiana Pacers.

headline.main: Heat Loss Gives Pacers No. 1 Seed
headline.print_headline: Heat Loss Gives Pacers No. 1 Seed
